5f35b0f0-9c4e-496c-a0ae-e0918237ae48.description: Earners of Blackmores Nutritional Oils Expert Advisor badge are able to explain why essential fatty acids are important for health and wellbeing. They can especially describe the health benefits of the omega-3 essential fatty acids DHA and EPA and can recommend food sources. Earners can provide insights and practical tips to help their customers, have knowledge to respond to customer concerns and can confidently recommend a product and dosage to meet customer’s needs.
5f35b0f0-9c4e-496c-a0ae-e0918237ae48.name: Blackmores 2021 Nutritional Oils Expert Advisor (MY)

99bb03b7-4b1c-4d8a-94a6-b3a15f61773d.description: Earners of the Blackmores Health Health Expert Advisor badge have learnt the fundamentals of how the heart and blood vessels are structured and function together. They can advise on diet and lifestyle habits that support cardivascular health, and are able to ask the right questions to confidently recommend products to meet their customer’s needs and explain their use for optimal results.
99bb03b7-4b1c-4d8a-94a6-b3a15f61773d.name: Blackmores 2021 Heart Health Expert Advisor (MY)

93fede1c-fc51-47b4-a77b-6351aeefe563.description: The Blackmores Institute CMEd Bronze badge is awarded to Pharmacists who have demonstrated a sound knowledge of complementary medicine ingredients. They are able to describe the main actions, indications and therapeutic benefits of vitamins, minerals, nutritional oils and herbal medicines. Earners can recognise deficiency signs and common interactions, in order to confidently evaluate and recommend appropriate complementary medicines to customers using a robust integrative prescribing model.
93fede1c-fc51-47b4-a77b-6351aeefe563.name: Blackmores Institute CMEd Bronze

badge_template_activities.title: Why complementary medicines?, Water-soluble vitamins, Fat-soluble vitamins, Macrominerals, Microminerals, Essential fatty acids, Herbs 1, Herbs 2, Prebiotics and probiotics, Delivering integrative care.

1e82cec5-4352-45d8-b286-92f5f39b35d2.description: Earners of the Blackmores Immune Health Expert Advisor badge have learnt how to support immune system health and what can be done to help customers recover more quickly from a cold. They are able to ask the right questions to confidently recommend products to meet their customer’s needs and explain their use for optimal results. Earners have a fundamental understanding of the immune system and the nutrients to support immune system health.

8f91fed6-32d4-4cb2-940b-0bdbc1244136.description: Earners of the Blackmores Essential Nutrients Expert Advisor badge have learnt about the various roles of vitamins and minerals, recommended daily intakes and common food sources. 70aee6e0-1266-44c4-a54f-918e4f606998.description: Earners of the Blackmores Eye Health Expert Advisor badge are able to ask the right questions to confidently recommend an eye health product to meet their customer’s needs. They can also explain how to use eye health products for optimal results. They have learnt to identify customer types who may benefit from Blackmores range of eye health products. Earners have a fundamental understanding of eye health and the nutrients and herbs that support eye health.
70aee6e0-1266-44c4-a54f-918e4f606998.name: Blackmores Eye Health Expert Advisor 2023 (AU)

69d4fadc-0986-40c8-a9e8-fac1e52bad88.description: The Blackmores Certified Advisor 2021 badge is awarded to Pharmacy Assistants who have completed Expert Advisor badges in the five BeCertified health categories. These include Immune Health, Probiotics, Nutritional Oils, Everyday Health and Joint, Bone and Muscle. Earners have the knowledge and skills to ask the right questions to confidently recommend products to meet their customer needs and explain their use for optimal results.
69d4fadc-0986-40c8-a9e8-fac1e52bad88.name: Blackmores 2021 Certified Advisor

7d3fcda1-8173-43fc-a270-de7f2731522e.description: The Blackmores Institute CMEd Platinum Badge is awarded to Pharmacists who have completed the Blackmores Institute CMEd Bronze, Silver and Gold badges and have successfully completed a case study based final assessment. Earners have applied the knowledge gained in the CMEd certification program to manage common conditions encountered in the pharmacy. This has been achieved through the construction of an integrated management plan incorporating evidence based complementary medicines.
7d3fcda1-8173-43fc-a270-de7f2731522e.name: Blackmores Institute CMEd Platinum

badge_template_activities.title: Blackmores Institute CMEd Bronze, Blackmores Institute CMEd Silver, Blackmores Institute CMEd Gold

0c1730c3-1eed-45ab-9652-60fa642fda08.description: The Blackmores Institute CMEd Certification badge is awarded to Pharmacists who have completed the CMEd Ingredients and CMEd Health Conditions badges and have successfully completed a case study based final assessment. Earners have applied the knowledge gained in the CMEd certification program to manage common conditions encountered in the pharmacy. c71422cb-c99f-4b42-8c91-8929e38006f9.description: Earners of the Blackmores Pregnancy Health Expert Advisor badge are able to support customers in preparing for a healthy pregnancy and healthy foetal development. They can also advise their pregnant and breast-feeding customers on which supplements might be beneficial. Earners have a fundamental understanding of the vitamins and minerals that support a healthy mother and baby and are able to communicate these to their customers.
c71422cb-c99f-4b42-8c91-8929e38006f9.name: Blackmores Pregnancy Health Expert Advisor 2023 (AU)

18a358f3-33a5-42ed-aa35-04628b93e1c6.description: Earners of the Blackmores Everyday Health Expert Advisor badge have learnt about the factors which may influence their nutrient intake, how a multivitamin can support health goals and the types of customers who may benefit from a multivitamin. They are able to ask the right questions to confidently recommend products to meet their customer’s needs and explain their use for optimal results. Earners have a fundamental understanding of nutrients required to support general health.
18a358f3-33a5-42ed-aa35-04628b93e1c6.name: Blackmores 2021 Everyday Health Expert Advisor (NZ)

ff71a48f-e0bf-4c35-b787-ebb9ded0c85d.description: Earners of the Blackmores Immune Health Expert Advisor badge have learnt how to support immune system health and what can be done to help customers recover more quickly from a cold. They are able to ask the right questions to confidently recommend products to meet their customer’s needs and explain their use for optimal results. Earners have a fundamental understanding of the immune system and the nutrients to support immune system health.
ff71a48f-e0bf-4c35-b787-ebb9ded0c85d.name: Blackmores 2021 Immune Health Expert Advisor (NZ)

cb6783a4-09f9-4011-bb60-0ddc8ec8cfee.description: Earners of the Blackmores Joint, Bone & Muscle Expert Advisor badge are able to describe the role various structures play in movement. They can explain how to maintain healthy joints and muscles and strong bones, as well as identify the many benefits of physical activity and guidelines for different customers. They are able to ask the right questions to confidently recommend products to meet their customer’s needs and explain their use for optimal results.
